amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated or expended for assistance to the following entities: (1) The Government of Iran. (2) Hamas. (3) Hizbullah. (4) The Muslim Brotherhood.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be obligated or expended for assistance to the Government of Iran, Hamas, Hizbullah, or the Muslim Brotherhood.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Gosar.
